T02D3052:105a-1: ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3052:105a-3: gshin rje gshed po sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3052:105a-4: mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3052:105a-5: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D3052:105a-6: klu la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis 'jigs //
T02D3052:105a-7: mgon po gshin rje gshed phyag 'tshal //
T02D3052:105a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3052:105a-9: bde ba'i stan la mnyam 'dug ste //
T02D3052:105a-10: h'um ni sngon po snying gar dgod //
T02D3052:105a-11: des bskyed mchod ba'i khyad par gyis //
T02D3052:105a-12: gus pas gtso bo yang dag mchod //
T02D3052:105a-13: byas nas de yi mdun du ni //
T02D3052:105a-14: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D3052:105a-15: 'gro kun dngos po med pa yi //
T02D3052:105a-16: de bzhin nyid du gsal por blta //
T02D3052:105a-17: snying ga'i sa bon gyur tshon byung //
T02D3052:105a-18: zhabs kyi padma g-yon brkyang zhing //
T02D3052:105a-19: khro gnyer g-yo bas 'jigs pa'i gdong //
T02D3052:105a-20: aog sbu mgo skyes ser la mdzes //
T02D3052:105a-21: zhal gsum lce ni 'dri la ba la //
T02D3052:105a-22: 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can //
T02D3052:105a-23: khrag gi mig can gsus po che //
T02D3052:105a-24: char sbrin sngon po lta bu'i mdog / nyi ma'i dkyil du gnas pa yi //
T02D3052:105a-25: ma he la ni gnas pas mtshon //
T02D3052:105a-26: mi'u thung lta bu stag lpags man pas //
T02D3052:105a-27: bde byed la sogs dregs pa 'joms //
T02D3052:105a-28: nyi ma'i 'od zer mdangs chen pos //
T02D3052:105a-29: nam mkha' ma lus kun du 'gengs //
T02D3052:105a-31: 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bu //
T02D3052:105a-32: 'khor lo ral gri gtun shing dang //
T02D3052:105a-33: gri gug sta re zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3052:105a-34: g-yas dang g-yon pa min pa yi //
T02D3052:105a-35: lha yi phyag drug rtag tu bsnams //
T02D3052:105a-36: 'jigs mdzad khror bcas rab tu grags //
T02D3052:105a-37: bdud ni 'dul byed gshin rje gshed //
T02D3052:105a-38: gur ni h'um gis bkang byas pa //
T02D3052:105a-39: 'jigs dang bral nas bsgom par bya //
T02D3052:105a-40: steng phrag nyi shu'i phyed du ni //
T02D3052:105b-0: sngags @105b rnams sngags rig pas rtag tu //
T02D3052:105b-1: bzlas te lus sogs ma yengs pas //
T02D3052:105b-3: 'di sngon bsnyen pa'i cho ga ste //
T02D3052:105b-4: gsang sngags grags par byas pa bstan //
T02D3052:105b-5: de ni shin tu mang ba'i phyir //
T02D3052:105b-6: las dang rjes mthun ma bstan te //
T02D3052:105b-7: de ni dngos grub gang 'dod pas ;
T02D3052:105b-8: / rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag las //
T02D3052:105b-9: las kun grub pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D3052:105b-10: dpa' bos 'bad pas shes par bya //
T02D3052:105b-11: bla ma bzhed pa'i cho ga rtogs pa las //
T02D3052:105b-12: bdag gis sgrub thabs byas pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D3052:105b-13: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu myur du ni //
T02D3052:105b-14: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni thob par shog /'phags
T02D3052:105b-15: pa gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D3052:105b-16: phyogs gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3052:105b-18: // / khro bo'i rgyal po'i klu rnams kyi //
T02D3052:105b-19: kha dog la sogs mi dran gang //
T02D3052:105b-20: de phyir de yi ched du ni //
T02D3052:105b-21: de dag kha dog dbyibs kyang bshad //
T02D3052:105b-22: dga' bo rigs ldan nag po ste //
T02D3052:105b-23: sgra ni bcings nas gnas pa yin //
T02D3052:105b-24: taksha ka ni gser mdog ste //
T02D3052:105b-25: rna ba'i rgyan du 'bad pas byas //
T02D3052:105b-26: padma chen po lag gdub ste //
T02D3052:105b-27: gser ni bsregs pa lta bu'i mdog / mchod phyir thogs su byas pa ni /
T02D3052:105b-28: karko ta ste dkar po yin //
T02D3052:105b-29: ba su ki ni ske rags te //
T02D3052:105b-30: padma dmar po dri med mdangs //
T02D3052:105b-31: rkang gdub padma dung yin te //
T02D3052:105b-32: kun du bandu ka yi mdog / rgya gar gyi
T02D3052:105b-33: mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang
T02D3052:105b-34: / lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T02D3052:105b-36: // / aom a'a: kro dha ka ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
